_header: Glad in God call home your heart
Title(s): ‘God kepe oure kyng and saue the croun’
_description: ‘God kepe oure kyng and saue the croun’ &c. [=Henry V] — nineteen 8-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
Glade in god call hom ȝoure herteIn ioye & blisse
                    ȝoure merþe encres…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…And god kepe in þy gouernaunceOure comely kyng and saue
                    þe crowne
BodDig102.Attributed Title: God kepe oure kyng And saue the Croun (f. 110v)
BodDig102.Editions:

                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
